propertyDescriptor.name: SSRSServerURL
propertyDescriptor.description: The is the baseURL to the server used to load SSRS reports. It is expected to be something like: 'http://myServer.edu/Reports/Pages/ReportViewer.aspx?'

propertyDescriptor.name: SSRSReportFolder
propertyDescriptor.description: This is the subfolder within SSRS that holds the EHR reports

propertyDescriptor.name: DocumentArchiveContainer
propertyDescriptor.description: This is the container path to the folder that will store documents related to arrivals and departures from the center.

propertyDescriptor.name: VetReviewStartDate
propertyDescriptor.description: There are reports that show records based on date of last vet review. Because legacy animals may not have this value, a default date can be supplied, resulting in records prior to this date being considered reviewed.
